title: Minuette
description: June's London Harmony is relentlessly searching for an elusive musical genius. The mysterious Minuette. She enlists the help of a young woman named Annette to assist Fran n that pursuit.Annette must navigate the a thin line between deception and aiding the people at London Harmony who quickly become more like family to the awkward and obsessive compulsive girl.Things are complicated when she admits to herself that she has fallen for her flatmate and lifelong friend, Mindy.(London Harmony is a spinoff of the Music of the Soul books.)
author: Erik Schubach
